Music

Posted on October 20, 2014

I should do something that must add a song here if I listen to it often. I have no idea how I would do it.
Keith Whitley: When You Say Nothing at All
Rascal Flatts: God Bless the Broken Road
Darden Smith: Perfect Moment
Eddie Vedder: No Ceiling
Phillip Phillips: Gone Gone Gone Luke Bryan: Drink a Beer
Rosi Golan: Think of Me
Sara Bareilles: Choose You
Owl City: Vanilla Twilight
Owl City: Honey and the Bee
James Dunn: Each Other’s Eyes
Beautiful Soul: Don’t Remeber
Journey: Don’t Stop Believing

Still figuring out.
